mapper.insert: insert into sample_school_students (student_id, student_name, student_password, student_grade, department_no) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{grade}, #{departmentNo})
mapper.select: select student_id as id, student_name as name, student_password as password, student_grade as grade, department_no as departmentNo from sample_school_students where student_id = #{value}
